description.value: Once per day as an Interact action, you can siphon nutrients from a dead creature. You consume part of a creature that hasn't been dead for more than 24 hours, and you heal 3d8 Hit Points, plus 1d8 for every 2 of your levels beyond 5th (@Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2)d8)[healing]]).

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
